entities.name: GESTURES
entities.description: Gestures are a form of body language used to communicate without words

entities.name: POSTURE
entities.description: Posture is a form of body language that can reveal a person's thoughts and feelings

entities.name: EYE CONTACT
entities.description: Maintaining eye contact is a form of body language that can signal attentiveness and engagement

entities.name: PROXEMICS
entities.description: Proxemics refers to the distance between individuals during an interaction, conveying important cultural and personal cues

entities.name: CONFIDENCE
entities.description: Confidence is a quality that can be projected through body language, such as maintaining good posture and making direct eye contact

entities.name: RAPPORT
entities.description: Rapport is a relationship of mutual understanding or trust, which can be established through body language

entities.name: CONFLICT RESOLUTION
entities.description: Body language can play a role in resolving conflicts by improving communication and understanding

entities.name: RELATIONSHIP BUILDING
entities.description: Body language can help build stronger relationships by enhancing communication and connection

relations: Facial expressions and gestures are both forms of body language used to convey emotions and intentions
Gestures and posture are both forms of body language that can enhance the clarity and effectiveness of communication
Facial expressions and posture are both forms of body language that can reveal a person's thoughts and feelings
Confidence can be projected through good posture, which is a form of body language
Rapport can be established through mirroring another person's posture, a form of body language
Eye contact and proxemics are both forms of body language that can convey important social and cultural cues
Body language can play a crucial role in resolving conflicts by improving communication and understanding
Body language can help build stronger relationships by enhancing communication and connection
